card.name: Acolyte's Reward
card.property: Prevent the next X damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn, where X is your devotion to white. You may reveal a legendary creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Pillar of War
card.property: Defender As long as this creature is enchanted, it can attack as though it didn't have defender.

card.name: Siren Song Lyre
card.property: Equipped creature has "{2}, {T}: Tap target creature." Equip {2}

card.name: Springleaf Drum
card.property: {T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Temple of Enlightenment
card.property: This land enters tapped. When this land enters, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.) {T}: Add {W} or {U}.

card.name: Temple of Malice
card.property: This land enters tapped. When this land enters, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.) {T}: Add {B} or {R}.

card.name: Temple of Plenty
card.property: This land enters tapped. When this land enters, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.) {T}: Add {G} or {W}.
